overview: WCW hits the road and heads to Sturgis, South Dakota for Road Wild '97! "The Total Package" Lex Luger puts the WCW World Heavyweight Championship on the line against Hollywood Hogan. The Steiner Brothers battle The Outsiders for the WCW World Tag Team Championship. The Giant faces "Macho Man" Randy Savage. Plus, Ric Flair, Chris Jericho, Rey Misterio Jr., and more!
title: WCW Road Wild 1997
